summary: Big Earl, the owner of a Christmas tree lot in Compton, California runs into some trouble when his son Derrick crosses the line to prove to his father that he is a success.
cast: Ayo Adeyemi|Charlotte Ayanna|Kamilah Barrett|Alycia Bellamy|Jayda Brown|Orlando Brown|Christopher Carroll|Luke Christopher|Porscha Coleman|Melanie Comarcho|Keith David|Marcos De Silvas|Kristinia DeBarge|Fefe Dobson|Michael Duncan|Omar Gooding|Cynthia Graham|Reegan Haynes|Edwin Hodge|Spencer Hubbard|Budd Jackson|Leslie Jones|Bishop Don Magic Juan|Charles Kim|Arif S. Núñez Jr.|Zion Otano|Jay Perry|Sheryl Lee Ralph|Evan Rayner|Darryl Alan Reed|Eric Roberts|Robair Sims|Emiliano Torres|Matthew Willig|Malin Yhr|Heather Rae Young
title: Christmas in Compton
